about_the_game:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Advanced Fighting Fantasy 2E Ruleset

At last your two-day hike s over. You unsheath your sword, lay it down on the ground and sigh with relief as you lower yourself down on to the mossy rocks to sit for a moment's rest. You stretch, rub your eyes and finally look up at Firetop Mountain..."
Advanced Fighting Fantasy 2e is an RPG based upon the wildly popular Fighting Fantasy gamebooks, of which many millons of copies have been sold over the last 40 years.
Explore Firetop Mountain, the Shamutanti Hills and the Isles of the Dawn. Face down Wheelies, Calacorm and Blood Beasts. Cast the amazing ZED spell and pray for help from Libra. Grab your sword, leather armour, lantern and Potion of STAMINA and find either fame and fortune or ignominious demise...
This ruleset for Fantasy Ground features:
  • Fast and easy to learn game mechanics
  • Four different magic systems for Cantrips, Wizards, Sorcerers and Priests
  • All of the weapons, spells, talents and special skills from the core rulebook
  • The core rulebook as a reference
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Graham Bottley
Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Advanced Fighting Fantasy 2e Ruleset ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.
